item.title: 莱维敦播客一个真实的人工智能深度伪造恐怖故事
item.description: 讲述纽约郊区如何成为全球打击假色情的中心。彭博社、万花筒和 iHeartPodcasts 推出新播客《莱维镇》。【原文：The story of how a New York suburb became the epicenter of the global fight against deepfake pornography. Bloomberg, Kaleidoscope and iHeartPodcasts present a new podcast, Levittown.】

item.title: 关税导致材料成本上升，美国工厂活动下滑
item.description: 受与关税相关的材料成本上升的影响，美国制造业本月再次陷入萎缩，同时服务业前景恶化。【原文：US manufacturing slipped back into contraction territory this month, plagued by a tariff-related rise in materials costs, while the service sector outlook deteriorated.】

item.title: 加拿大的波利耶夫尔承诺比卡尼更大幅度地削减所得税
item.description: 加拿大保守党领袖皮埃尔-波利瓦尔（Pierre Poilievre）承诺将比自由党领袖马克-卡尼（Mark Carney）更大幅度地削减所得税，两位政治家正在激烈的竞选中为吸引注重经济承受能力的选民而战。【原文：Canadian Conservative Leader Pierre Poilievre is promising a deeper income tax cut than Liberal Leader Mark Carney, as the two politicians battle to attract affordability-minded voters in a tight election race.】

item.title: Verizon 寻求出售高等级票据为债务赎回提供资金
item.description: Verizon Communications Inc. 计划于周一出售投资级公司债券，部分用于为明年到期的近 10 亿美元票据赎回提供资金。【原文：Verizon Communications Inc. is planning to sell investment-grade corporate bonds on Monday, in part to help finance the redemption of close to $1 billion of notes due next year.】

item.title: 舜宇光学警告产能过剩将导致市场重组
item.description: 舜宇光学科技集团股份有限公司警告说，全球经济放缓加上创新可能会带来市场的 "深度重组"。【原文：Sunny Optical Technology Group Co. warned that a global economic slowdown coupled with innovation could bring about a “deep restructuring” of the market.】

item.title: Bullion Explorer 用新名称宣传 MAGA：美国制造黄金
item.description: 一家加拿大投资公司将其专注于美国的子公司从 NV King Goldlands 更名为 Made in America Gold。这一改名正值美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）鼓励企业将业务迁往美国，并威胁对进口商品征收不断升级的关税之际。【原文：A Canadian investment firm changed the name of its US-focused subsidiary to Made in America Gold from NV King Goldlands. The switch comes as US President Donald Trump is encouraging firms to relocate operations to the country and threatening imports with escalating tariffs.】

item.title: BE 模型显示，巴西经济衰退的担忧被夸大了
item.description: 彭博经济公司（Bloomberg Economics）的最新研究显示，巴西经济在高利率的影响下正在降温，但面临即将衰退的风险相对较低。【原文：Brazil’s economy is cooling under sky-high interest rates but faces relatively low risks of imminent recession, according to new research from Bloomberg Economics.】

item.title: 巴基斯坦液化天然气过剩显示新兴市场需求脆弱
item.description:
该国的困境昭示了一个不为人知的事实：当燃料变得昂贵时，发展中国家就会停止购买。【原文：

The country’s woes signal an inconvenient truth: When the fuel gets expensive, the developing world just stops buying.

】

item.title: 系统性 "银行挤兑 "风险笼罩国会稳定币法案
item.description: 目前，加密货币市场中最安全的一个角落正受到热捧，这勾起了人们对之前危机的糟糕回忆。【原文：The current excitement about one of the safest corners of the cryptocurrency markets is bringing up bad memories of previous crises.】

item.title: 智利央行上调经济增长和通胀预测
item.description: 智利央行上调了 2025 年经济增长和年底通胀预期，几天前，决策者们曾表示他们并不急于恢复降息。【原文：Chile’s central bank raised its 2025 economic growth and year-end inflation forecasts days after policymakers signaled they’re in no rush to resume interest-rate reductions.】

item.title: 墨西哥投票前通胀放缓幅度超预期
item.description: 墨西哥 3 月上半月的通胀放缓幅度超过预期，墨西哥央行将于本周召开会议，考虑连续第六次降息，并可能连续第二次降息半个百分点。【原文：Mexico’s inflation slowed more than expected in the first half of March, as the central bank is set to meet this week to consider a sixth straight rate cut and likely a second straight half-point reduction.】

item.title: Saylor's Strategy 在优先股出售后买入更多比特币
item.description: 迈克尔-赛勒的 "战略 "公司上周通过出售所谓的 "永续优先股 "筹集了超过 7 亿美元的资金，之后又购买了 5.841 亿美元的比特币。【原文：Michael Saylor’s Strategy bought $584.1 million of Bitcoin after raising more than $700 million last week through the sale of so-called perpetual strife preferred stock.】

item.title: 瑞银重聘科技银行家卡明-维斯康蒂（Carmine Visconti）担任欧洲区高级职务
item.description: 瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）聘请科技交易员卡迈恩-维斯康蒂（Carmine Visconti）在伦敦担任高级职务。【原文：UBS Group AG has hired tech dealmaker Carmine Visconti for a senior role in London.】

item.title: 印度因市场增长放宽全球基金信息披露规范
item.description: 印度证券市场监管机构周一以该国股市股票交易量增长为由，批准提高全球基金最终实益所有权详细披露的门槛，而这一规定实施还不到两年。【原文：India’s securities market regulator Monday approved raising the threshold for granular disclosures on ultimate beneficial ownership of global funds less than two years after the rule was implemented, citing growth in volumes of shares traded in the country’s stock market.】

item.title: 关税在振兴美国创新中的作用
item.description: 在更多关税和唐纳德-特朗普总统所称的 4 月 2 日 "解放日 "倒计时之际，有一个问题值得您深思：美国经济善于创新吗？【原文：Here’s a question for you to ponder as we count down to more tariffs and what President Donald Trump has called “Liberation Day” April 2: Is the US economy good at innovation?】

item.title: 人工智能模型驱动排名第一的基金对人工智能股票发出警告
item.description: 多年来，早在人工智能成为华尔街的热门新事物之前，丹尼尔-马赫（Daniel Mahr）就已经利用他的机器学习模型在股票上赚了钱。【原文：For years now, way before artificial intelligence became the hot new thing on Wall Street, Daniel Mahr has been making money on stocks, courtesy of his machine-learning model.】

item.title: Clearlake 公司同意以 41 亿美元收购 Dun & Bradstreet 公司
item.description: Clearlake Capital Group 同意收购 Dun & Bradstreet Holdings Inc.【原文：Clearlake Capital Group has agreed to acquire Dun & Bradstreet Holdings Inc. in a deal that values one of Wall Street’s oldest data and analytics providers at $4.1 billion.】

item.title: 印度将与非洲国家举行海军演习以对抗中国
item.description: 印度将与几个非洲国家举行海军演习，这是首次此类海上演习，印度试图以此对抗中国在印度洋地区的强硬存在。【原文：India will hold naval drills with several African nations, the first maritime exercise of this kind, as it tries to counter China’s assertive presence in the Indian Ocean region.】

item.title: 汇丰银行认为英国央行因通胀不利因素而放缓降息步伐
item.description: 汇丰银行（HSBC Bank Plc）的经济学家以近期通胀压力为由，缩减了他们对英国央行降息步伐的预期。【原文：Economists at HSBC Bank Plc have scaled back the pace at which they expect the Bank of England to cut interest rates, citing near-term inflationary pressures.】

item.title: 科斯拉说，随着自满情绪的消退，信贷 "清算 "已经到来
item.description: 信贷投资者 Strategic Value Partners LLC 的创始人维克多-科斯拉（Victor Khosla）认为，在多年的自满开始减弱之后，债务市场正面临 "清算"。【原文：Debt markets are facing a “reckoning” after years of complacency start to weaken, according to Victor Khosla, the founder of credit investor Strategic Value Partners LLC.】

item.title: 欧盟贸易主管塞夫科维奇周二将在美国会见格里尔和卢特尼克
item.description: 欧盟贸易负责人马罗斯-塞夫科维奇（Maros Sefcovic）将于周二在美国会见美国商务部长霍华德-卢特尼克（Howard Lutnick）和美国贸易代表贾米森-格里尔（Jamieson Greer）。【原文：The European Union’s trade chief, Maros Sefcovic, will meet US Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick and US Trade Representative Jamieson Greer in the US Tuesday.】

item.title: 美国科技制造业遭遇赖特定律
item.description: 欢迎阅读 Tech In Depth，这是我们改版后的每日时事通讯，由彭博社全球记者提供有关科技商业的报道和分析。今天，德雷克-贝内特（Drake Bennett）将探讨将电子制造业带回美国的一些实际不利因素。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our revamped daily newsletter with reporting and analysis about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Drake Bennett looks at some practical disadvantages in the quest to bring electronics manufacturing back to the US.】

item.title: 中国船舶征税带来贸易 "启示录 "风险
item.description: 我是马尔科姆-斯科特，驻悉尼的国际经济企业编辑。今天，我们将关注劳拉-柯蒂斯（Laura Curtis）关于对停靠美国的中国船只征税的建议措施的报道。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net，或通过 @economics 在 X 上与我们联系。如果您尚未注册接收本新闻通讯，请点击此处。【原文：I’m Malcolm Scott, international economics enterprise editor in Sydney. Today we’re looking at Laura Curtis’s reporting on a proposed measure to impose levies on Chinese ships docking in the US. Send us feedback and tips to ecodaily@bloomberg.net or get in touch on X via @economics. And if you aren’t yet signed up to receive this newsletter, you can do so here.】

item.title: 大型初创企业交易额飙升至 550 亿美元，刷新季度纪录
item.description:
谷歌以 320 亿美元收购 Wiz 是科技并购热潮的一部分。【原文：

Google’s $32 billion Wiz deal is part of a surge of tech M&A. 

】

item.title: 闲置在市场上的普通住宅对经济造成潜在拖累
item.description:
建筑商在努力清理积压工作的同时，可能会减少新房建设。【原文：

Builders might pull back on new housing construction as they try to clear their backlog.

】

item.title: 美元疲软成为美国跨国公司的盈利利器
item.description: 在关税和贸易战给企业底线带来风险的时候，至少有一点附带损害能带来一线希望：美元走软。【原文：At a time when tariffs and trade wars pose risks to corporate bottom lines, at least one bit of collateral damage doubles as a silver lining: a weakening US dollar.】

item.title: 私募基金推动两字母税制改革以节省数十亿美元
item.description: 私募股权投资巨头们正准备为两个小字母而战。【原文：The giants of private equity are preparing to fight for two little letters.】

item.title: 壳牌首席执行官在纽约 "战略日 "聚焦液化天然气
item.description: 壳牌石油公司（Shell Plc）将于本周二更新其战略，而就在一个月前，陷入困境的竞争对手英国石油公司（BP Plc）公布了一项根本性的 "重启 "计划。【原文：Shell Plc will update its strategy on Tuesday, just a month after struggling rival BP Plc unveiled a fundamental “reset.”】

item.title: 支出进度缓慢，中国为贸易战积蓄财力
item.description: 中国政府似乎并不急于执行其预算，因为中国政府保留了支出能力，以应对美国提高关税造成的任何损害。【原文：China’s government appears in no rush to implement its budget, as Beijing preserves spending power to counter any damage inflicted by higher US tariffs.】

item.title: 南非在私人帮助下迈出修复铁路和港口的关键一步
item.description: 南非采取了迄今为止最大的举措，邀请私营部门帮助其修复破旧的货运铁路线和港口，这些线路和港口阻碍了嘉能可公司（Glencore Plc）、英美资源集团（Anglo American Plc）和宝马汽车公司（BMW AG）等公司的出口。【原文：South Africa has taken its biggest step yet to invite the private sector to help it fix dilapidated freight-rail lines and ports that are stymieing exports from companies including Glencore Plc, Anglo American Plc and BMW AG.】
